open.title: MetroFibre outage | Carlswald AH
open.description: MetroFibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Carlswald AH, affected clients will experience no connectivity. MetroFibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel Outage | Limpopo
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Polokwane, affected clients will experience no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content:
A further impact has been detected in the following areas.

-Polokwane
-Aqua Park
-Louis Trichardt
-Mankweng A

Vumatel engineers are working on restoring services in these areas as soon as possible.
